method.name: can_highlight
method.description: Determines whether the selectable object [param _highlighted] can be highlighted, optionally given [param _selected] object. This method may be optionally overridden. By default returns [true]

method.name: can_stack
method.description: Determines whether a selectable object can be stacked to another selectable object. This method may be optionally overridden. By default returns [true]

method.name: can_take_piece_off
method.description: Determines whether a piece can be taken off a collection. This method may be optionally overridden. By default returns [true]

method.name: game_start
method.description: Called when the board wants the game to start. Should be used to create all the initial game objects. NOTE: MUST be implemented by the configuration creator.

method.name: get_actions
method.description: Returns the list of user actions. This method may be optionally overridden. By default returns an empty [Array]

method.name: import_config
method.description: Import config WARNING: ALLOWS ARBITRARY CODE TO BE RAN, WAITING/HOPING FOR GDSCRIPT SANDBOXING IN THE FUTURE

method.name: run_action
method.description: Runs a specified action based off the action string, retrieved from get_actions() should return true if the action was successful, false otherwise. This method may be optionally overridden. By default returns [false]

method.name: set_images
method.description: Sets images from the ImageIncludes in this config
